---
title: Retrieve a Transaction
order: 20
---

import { Endpoint } from "components/Endpoint";
import { ExampleResponse } from "components/ExampleResponse";
import { CodeExample } from "components/CodeExample";
import { AttributeTable } from "components/AttributeTable";

The single transaction endpoint provides information on a specific transaction.

<Endpoint>

|     |                                 |
| --- | ------------------------------- |
| GET | /transactions/:transaction_hash |

</Endpoint>

<AttributeTable>

- ARGUMENT
  - REQUIRED
  - DESCRIPTION
- hash
  - required
  - A hex-encoded SHA-256 hash of this transactionâ€™s XDR-encoded form.

</AttributeTable>

<CodeExample title="Example Request">

```curl
curl "https://horizon.stellar.org/transactions/5ebd5c0af4385500b53dd63b0ef5f6e8feef1a7e1c86989be3cdcce825f3c0cc"
```

```js
var StellarSdk = require("stellar-sdk");
var server = new StellarSdk.Server("https://horizon.stellar.org");

server
  .transactions()
  .transaction(
    "5ebd5c0af4385500b53dd63b0ef5f6e8feef1a7e1c86989be3cdcce825f3c0cc",
  )
  .call()
  .then(function (resp) {
    console.log(resp);
  })
  .catch(function (err) {
    console.error(err);
  });
```

</CodeExample>

<ExampleResponse title="Example Response">

```json
{
  "_links": {
    "self": {
      "href": "https://horizon.stellar.org/transactions/5ebd5c0af4385500b53dd63b0ef5f6e8feef1a7e1c86989be3cdcce825f3c0cc"

    "account": {
      "href": "https://horizon.stellar.org/accounts/GDI5EK4HNMBHJJQGP3GUXQJIIOHU2CJO3LABPWD6WYSPJZP5NP67TMNN"

      "href": "https://horizon.stellar.org/ledgers/27963785"

  "successful": true,
```

</ExampleResponse>
